Title: Relates to equine screening and advanced imaging expenses
Summary: Provides for and requires equine screening and advanced imaging to be conducted by a land grant university within this state at a location proximate to a racetrack owned by the state.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Add ยง902-a, amd ยง1012-a, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to equine screening and advanced imaging expenses; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
